card_text: When your opponent activates a monster effect, while you control a "Therion" monster: You can activate 1 of these effects;$N●Negate that effect.$N●Banish that monster.$NIf you have "Endless Engine Argyro System" in your GY at activation, you can activate both effects (at resolution, negate, then banish). You can only activate 1 "Therion Cross" per turn.
